title: New 4V MAX* Roto-Bit Storage Screwdriver
description:

transcripts: Having a powered screwdriver around the house is convenient but finding bits for it can slow you down get ready for a new spin roto-bit four volt max storage screwdriver rotating on board storage keeps bits right where you need them. always ready convenience, lightweight compact and built-in LED to help light your way roto-bit 4 volt max storage screwdriver.
